definition: the power of a number (square, cube etc)/to exponentiate (math.)
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed
power/exponent (math.)/to cover with a cloth/cloth cover/veil

sentences.english: Returns the value of a base expression taken to a specified power.
sentences.chinese: 傳回指定乘冪值的基底運算式值。

sentences.english: Can see that extended interpolation method is superior than standard power.
sentences.chinese: 可以看出擴展特徵值法比標準乘冪法優越。

sentences.english: The distribution of underground root showed exponent relation.
sentences.chinese: 根系的空間分佈呈乘冪關係。

sentences.english: Second, the mean and variance has exponential relationship with stress amplitude.
sentences.chinese: 其次，均值和方差與應力幅水平成乘冪關係。

sentences.english: Power function of effecting factors with multiplication form was the good prediction model.
sentences.chinese: 各影響因子乘冪之相乘積函數有良好之預測能力。
